p: Similarly to Fig. 3c, the combination sites that were less than 1 indicate a synergistic effect between the essential oil obtained from A. conyzoides and doxycycline. The fact that the compounds show synergism means that their concentration in combination produces an effect that is stronger than when the treatments are used individually in a similar or greater concentration. For this synergistic property the inhibitors can be evaluated by calculating the drug dose reduction index (DRI, Eq. 4) for each treatment of each combination, and is plotted with the log (DRI) (Fig. 3e).
